java/liquibase/change/AbstractSQLChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00007 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00008 
00009 import java.util.ArrayList;
00010 import java.util.List;
00011 
00020 public abstract class AbstractSQLChange extends AbstractChange {
00021 
00022     private boolean stripComments;
00023     private boolean splitStatements;
00024     private String sql;
00025 
00026     protected AbstractSQLChange(String tagName, String changeName) {
00027         super(tagName, changeName);
00028         stripComments= false;
00029         splitStatements =true;
00030     }
00031 
00035     public void setStripComments(Boolean stripComments) {
00036         this.stripComments = stripComments;
00037     }
00038 
00043     public boolean isStrippingComments() {
00044         return stripComments;
00045     }
00046 
00053     public void setSplitStatements(Boolean splitStatements) {
00054         this.splitStatements = splitStatements;
00055     }
00056     
00061     public boolean isSplittingStatements() {
00062         return splitStatements;
00063     }
00064 
00065     public String getSql() {
00066         return sql;
00067     }
00068 
00072     public void setSql(String sql) {
00073        this.sql = sql;
00074     }
00075     
00086     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database)
00087             throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00088 
00089         List<SqlStatement> returnStatements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00090 
00091         String processedSQL = isStrippingComments() ? StringUtils.stripComments(getSql()) : getSql();
00092         
00093         if(isSplittingStatements()) {
00094             String[] statements = StringUtils.splitSQL(processedSQL);
00095             for (String statement : statements) {
00096                 returnStatements.add(new RawSqlStatement(statement));
00097             }
00098         }
00099         else {
00100             returnStatements.add(new RawSqlStatement(processedSQL));
00101         }
00102         
00103         return returnStatements.toArray(new SqlStatement[returnStatements.size()]);
00104     }
00105 }
